text: Meir Pa'il, , (June 19, 1926 - September 15, 2015) was an Israeli colonel, politician and military historian. He served as a member of the Knesset from 1974 through 1980. He was born in Jerusalem. Pa'il died from complications of Alzheimer's disease in Jerusalem, aged 89. ==References== ==Other websites== * Bio at Knesset Website Category:1926 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Israeli colonels Category:Members of the Knesset Category:Israeli historians Category:Jewish Israeli politicians Category:Writers from Jerusalem Category:Jewish military people Category:Politicians from Jerusalem
title: Meir Pa'il
